feed.title: Category: Final Fantasy 12 | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 12 (PS2, 2006)
entry.content:
I bought a PS2 (after not having one for years) just to play this. It was awesome.

What an amazing game. The story is very deep and compelling. The characters really grow on you. It is perhaps the only instance of good voice acting in a game that I can think of. The game play is very fun and removes some of the annoying parts of most RPGs. The music is great and either touching or exciting, whatever is appropriate for the context. The graphics are beautiful, particularly in the final boss battle. And then ending is truly satisfying.
